body.p: 1. One of the Levites whom David commanded to play the harp when the ark of God was brought from the house of Obed-edom to Jerusalem (1 Chr 15:18-22), and who retained a permanent position under Asaph as one of the ministers of the ark (16:4-5).
2. Levite commissioned by Jehoshaphat to teach the law “through all the cities of Judah” (2 Chr 17:8).
